main: ^Hello, dear! I've never seen your face before.
main2: ^You're looking like a lost lamb. May I offer you my help, daahling?
main3: ^Good day. Well, you're not wrong - I am a bit lost.
main4: ^I'm looking for the mayor. Do you know where I can find her?
main7: ^She's standing right in front of you.
main8: ^What can I do for you, daahling?
main9: ^Oh, I apologize. Please let me officially introduce myself: I am Agent Hiro, member of The M.A.G.I.C. Council.
main10: ^We detected abnormal activity in this area and I'm here to investigate the cause and eliminate it. If left untreated, it could become... well, let's just say 'troublesome.'
main11: ^Anyway, I must admit, I'm really surprised to find a whole civilization this far from our solar system. I wonder how this happened....
main12: ^...?! Wh - what could be wrong with our lovely town?
main13: ^I've lived here for a long time, and it's always been a peaceful place. Oh dear! What do I do now?
main14: ^No need to panic. We, The M.A.G.I.C. Council, will take care of the matter. You just need to cooperate and answer some questions.
main15: ^To begin with, have there been any unusual occurrences lately? And if so, where?
main16: ^Uhh.... Unusual, you say...? I don't think so. The only annoying thing I can think of is the rain. It's been raining cats and dogs for ages now.
main18: ^If this goes on, my laundry will never get dry, daahling. But this isn't something I'd consider unusual. The rain has always liked our city.
main19: ^Thank you. I'm grateful for any information, no matter how trivial!
main20: ^Excuse me, daahling! I can't believe my ears. Are you implying doing laundry is something trivial?
main21: ^Try taking care of a household with ten little lambs by yourself and say that again to me! I dare you!
main22: ^Uhm, I'm very sorry Ms. Mayor. It was not my intention to offend you.
main23: ^You know what? Just go straight to Professor Wren and ask him anything you want to know.
main24: ^He's the most intelligent being in town- he specializes in ancient magic.
main25: ^I don't know anything about your abnormal activity and abaahcadabaah stuff
main26: ^You can probably find him at Hector's place. It's right next to the house with a ladder. Professor Wren's been there very often lately.
main27: ^Many thanks! So... I have one last favor to ask.
main28: ^Do you know where I can get a new phone? My old one broke down the moment I entered this place's atmosphere.
main29: ^I need to stay in constant contact with HQ, so this is very important.
main30: ^Sure thing! I know eeehverything about our shopping district!
main31: ^Just go to the "Bapple" store over there. Their stuff may be a bit overpriced, but trust me - it's worth it.
main32: ^Speaking of which, I'd best continue with my own shopping trip. Good luck, daahling!
EdithCheckpoint: ^The Bapple store is located up north, it has a big apple right over the entrance. After you get your Phone go visit Hector.
EdithCheckpointPhone: ^I see you have your new Phone, now go visit Hector! Just go through that archway to the east of the town.
